Importar CSV
#1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

yearly <- read.csv(file = './deaths_handwashing.csv')
yearly
```
#2
```{r}

yearly <- yearly %>%
  mutate(proportion_deaths = round(deaths / births, 2) )


yearly

```
#3

```{r}
# gráfica lineal
yearly
ggplot(data = yearly, aes(x=year, y= proportion_deaths, color=clinic )) + 
  stat_smooth(se=FALSE)
```

#4
```{r}
monthly <- read.csv(file = './deaths_clinic_1.csv')
monthly

monthly <- monthly %>%
  mutate(proportion_deaths = round(deaths / births, 2) )

monthly
head(monthly, 10) # primer 10 filas para mostrar
```
#5
```{r}
monthly
ggplot(data = monthly, aes(x= date, y=date, group = proportion_deaths)) +
   geom_line(aes(color = proportion_deaths)) +
    labs(y = "Fecha", 
         x = "Proporcionar de muertos", 
         title = "El efecto del lavado de manos", 
         caption = "Fuente: Elavoración propia")
```
#6
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)

monthly
monthly %>%
  filt
  
  filter( (date > as.POSIXct("1847-01-01")) ) %>%
  mutate(handwashing_started = FALSE )


```
